org.talend.commons.ui.swt.formtools
Class Form

java.lang.Object
  org.talend.commons.ui.swt.formtools.Form

public class Form
extends java.lang.Object

Utilities class uses to create swt forms.
swt Form add a statusLabel who is a default element of wizard $Id$
